A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''January 9, 2010''', at 19:39 UTC<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "(14:39:20) <Notch> indev's been updated"..."(14:39:22) <Notch> with fiiiire"</ref>, which added fire. It was announced on [[The Word of Notch|TWoN]] at 19:57 UTC<ref>[[wordofnotch:325534794|Fire in indev version, go try it out]] – The Word of Notch, January 9, 2010</ref>.

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Fire JE1.png|32px]] [[Fire]]'''
* Can burn certain types of [[block]]s (wool, logs, leaves, planks, bookshelves and TNT).<ref group=note>TNT ignites instead of disappearing when catching fire.</ref>
* 99 are given to the player in the sixth hotbar slot.<ref name="Load/save">{{ytl|rprfKDp5lHA|Minecraft Forest Fire Timelapse|Aluior|January 9, 2010}}</ref>
** Does not render in the hotbar due to it being an animated texture.

=== World generation ===
'''Inland type<ref>{{link|url=https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/minecraft-java-edition/discussion/113584-fire?page=4|title=New mode : Inland|author=Menen|website=Minecraft Forum|date=January 9, 2010}}</ref>'''
* Replaced the original type.
** Is like the original type, but has [[grass block]]s instead of [[water]] around the map.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
[[File:Torch JE2.png|32px]] '''[[Torch]]es '''
* Now are slightly dimmer.

'''[[File:Oak Sapling JE4.png|32px]] [[Sapling]] '''
* Changed the texture from [[File:Oak Sapling JE3.png|32px]].

'''[[File:TNT JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[TNT]]'''
* It is no longer activated when you hit it with your hand.

=== World generation ===
'''Hell theme'''
* [[Grass block]]s were replaced with [[dirt]].

'''Flat type'''
* The world is now surrounded by grass block instead of water.

=== General ===
'''[[Light]]'''
* There are now 16 light levels, instead of just 9.
* Now reaches further.</onlyinclude>
